Game.Name: Kikikai-kai Advance (Japan)
Game.plot: An evil Hydra Dragon has been awakened from a long sleep and has unleashed the world's most feared mythical creatures in the land.It is up to you to stop them and eventually put an end to the evil Hydra's madness!You can choose one of three characters, Pocky, Rocky the Raccoon or Becky to embark on this fantastic and dangerous adventure.Collect magical items and a variety of power-ups to help battle the mythical bosses as you journey to the final showdown with Hydra!Cheat: Becky Level PasswordsFrom the main menu press start and go to password.Cheat: Becky Level Passwords From the main menu press start and go to password.Cheat: Becky Level PasswordsFrom the main menu press start and go to password.
